LongDescription: <b><i>ELECTRICAL IMPROVEMENTS</i><br clear=left>[R] Bay Ridge-bound trains run express from Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr to 59 St, Brooklyn</b>Weekend, 9:45 PM Fri to 5 AM Mon, Jan 12 - 15<br><br>Trains stop at 36 St.<br><br>For service <i>to</i> Union St, 4 Av-9 St, Prospect Av and 25 St, take the [R] to 36 St and transfer to a <br>Manhattan-bound [F]* <i>local</i>, [N]* or [R].<br><br>For service <i>from</i> these stations, take the [F] [N] or [R] to Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr and transfer <br>to a Bay Ridge-bound [R].<br><br>For service <i>to</i> 45 St and 53 St, take the [R] to 59 St and transfer to a Manhattan-bound [N] or [R].<br><br>For service <i>from</i> these stations, take the [N] or [R] to 36 St and transfer to a Bay Ridge-bound [R].<br><br><i>*This detour has taken into account additional planned service changes.<br></i><b><br>

Summary._: STATION ENHANCEMENTS  [W] Astoria-bound trains skip 39 Av and Broadway

Description._: STATION ENHANCEMENTS  [W] Astoria-bound trains skip 39 Av and Broadway

LongDescription: <b><i>STATION ENHANCEMENTS</i><br clear=left>[W] Astoria-bound trains skip 39 Av and Broadway</b>Late Evenings, 9:45 PM to 11:30 PM, Friday, Jan 12, 19 <i>and</i> 26<br><br>For service<i> to</i> these stations, take the [W] to Astoria Blvd and transfer to a <br>Manhattan-bound [N] or [W].<br><br>For service<i> from </i>these stations, take the [N] or [W] to Queensboro Plaza and transfer to an<br>Astoria-bound [N] or [W].<br><br><b>Note:</b> 36 Av and 30 Av are closed for renovation.<br><b><br>
